title: Relax ASMR Sounds |   Noam Chomsky interview on surveillance Deep, relaxing voice
description:
An unintentional ASMR video that has been requested many times is a Noam Chomsky interview.
5 hours of Noam's soft spoken voice:.

 this is an interview with Noam Chomsky from 2014 where he is interviewed by Juan Branco. This video has been edited and is only half the length of the full interview as the audio quality isn't great in the first half. To see the full video check below. 
Hope you find this relaxing
